verbs.description: [V: sony] [ARG1: tiny hx99 camera] comes with a 30x zoom lens there are a lot of impressive superzooms out there but sony new hx99 and hx95 models might the smallest they squeeze a 30x 24 - 720 mm f 3 5 - 6 equivalent zoom lens sony zoom lens camera
